fullText: Your milage may vary. My husband was a wreck after just the first act, but I wasn’t as moved by the musical as I was the film, a form that is simultaneously more intimate and frighteningly real.

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The reviewer explicitly states the experience will vary by person and expresses personal disappointment compared to the film version, indicating a lukewarm mixed reaction. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses a mixed sentiment, indicating a lack of strong emotional impact compared to the film, suggesting a conditional recommendation.
